posts.raw_content:
Heckle, mock and withdraw support from Republicans that are trying to continue down the path of demographic replacement. 

Deporting illegal immigrants and closing the border is a good start, but the entire reason we're in this mess is because the US of today has been flooded with immigrants who just came here to extract resources. 

1) Visa programs need to be significantly reduced, if not outright ended. Between the 1920s and 1960s - 4 decades - there was only 8 million immigrants and visa holders. Roughly 200k per year is manageable. The H1 system just encourages laziness amongst our training and education institutions. I don't care what excuses Elon and Trump have. EVEN if we accept what they say is true, LOSING ECONOMIC COMPETITION IS PREFERABLE TO LOSING YOUR ETHNIC AND CULTURAL TRADITIONS. I have tons of investments. Numbers on the stock exchange do not matter to me nearly as much as recognizing my country in 20 years. I don't care how many engineers and doctors and telemarketers India offers. It's our leaders' fault for making our economy dependent on foreign labor and they can put up with losing money for a few generations. 

2) Muslims need to go, especially Somali and Pakistani Muslims. They are parasitic. They aren't even Turks and Indians. They don't set up barber shops and gas stations. Over 70% of them use government benefits. They constantly support eachother stealing resources. Do you know fewer than 1.3% of Japanese and Korean Americans use public resources? What's the Muslims' excuses? Nearly every Muslim community that has formed since the Obama administration needs to be thoroughly "encouraged" to go home. 

3) And to be clear, this Israel first nonsense is ending. MIGA is a real problem and it needs to end. Trump is incredibly weak here. I get it. Boomers were constantly indoctrinated every single day about the Holocaust being the worst thing ever in history. It's been nearly 100 years. We've given Israel everything they could ever want. Israel can become just another ally. AIPAC is a foreign influence campaign and it should be illegal along with the Saudi and Qatar influence. We don't lecture and cancel people for opposing France or Singapore or any other allies. If Jews and Jew-obsessed "Christians" like the Daily Wire just can't deal with this reality then it's time for them to leave.

posts.author: flp999
posts.title: American Thinker article makes a good point I’ve only heard made by one other person, David Lynch (yep, the director). 1950s “family shows” like Leave it to Beaver weren’t oppressive, they weren’t models people felt they had to live up to. They were ASPIRATIONAL. A nice fantasy that served a purpose

link_metadata.description: In the 1950s, family TV shows displayed a very specific view of the ideal world. While this view may not have been accurate, it was aspirational and could apply equally to all races. Leftists, however, destroyed these aspirations, seeking instead to ...
link_metadata.title: 1950s TV Families Were Aspirational Models For A Good Society
